de.fau.amos

Class TimestampConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fau.amos.TimestampConversion

  • public class TimestampConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    The TimestampConversion.java class is necessary for the conversion into the right format for an easy PostgreSQL handling. It converses the input time into the required timestamp (e.g. String format).

      converts any committed Integer time into a String timestamp
      static java.lang.String convertTimestamp(java.lang.String Timestamp)
      if the timestamp is already a String, this method builds up a new timestamp with correct character in between
